data.text: Roho mar Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ni kuoma,
Bende oseora mondo aland ni ma e higa mar ngʼwono mar Jehova Nyasaye,
abiro konyo jogo man-gi lit Sayun,
Ginichak giger kuonde machon mane omukore,
Kendo noluongu ni jodolo mag Jehova Nyasaye,
Kar yudo wichkuot to joga noyud pok nyadiriyo,
An-gi mor maduongʼ e nying Jehova Nyasaye;
Mana kaka lowo miyo cham twi,
